subject: HA LONG CO.,LTD - CHUYEN THIET KE WEB - NANG CAP WEB                                             GBGRTBPOOH
body:
HA LONG CO.,LTD Tran trong kinh chao quy khach hang!

HA LONG CO.,LTD - CHUYEN THIET KE WEB - NANG CAP WEB

CHAT LUONG SAN PHAM, SUPPORT CHUYEN NGHIEP, HAU MAI CHU DAO: Giup Ha Long Co.,Ltd khang dinh dang cap chuyen nghiep cua nha thiet ke web hang dau.

KHUYEN MAI: 100 Domain va 100 Hosting Doanh Nghiep I cho 100 KHACH HANG DAU TIEN tu ngay 01/04/07 den 01/06/07
Thiet ke web dong 100% voi cong nghe moi nhat cua Microsoft: C#.NET, Ajax.NET,XML Scripting, data MS SQL...
+) Co hoi tham gia chuong trinh ho tro doanh nghiep: thuong mai dien tu bat dau chi voi 2.000.000 VND
+) Chuong trinh khuyen mai dac biet chi voi 4.000.000 so huu trang web dong cong nghe bac nhat hien nay <= Chi co tai HaLong Co.,Ltd
+) Chuong trinh hop tac kinh doanh (Tim doi tac): Quy vi se duoc hoa hong hop ly khi gioi thieu khach hang hoac trien khai cac dich vu cua HaLong Co.,Ltd

Ha Long Co.,Ltd - Khang dinh dang cap chuyen nghiep cua nha thiet ke website hang dau <= lan dau tien co mat tai VIET NAM;
- Duoc dung thu web cua minh tren internet trong khi thi cong va truoc khi ban giao!  <= Dich vu hoan hao cho khach hang;
- Bo quan tri (CMS) hoan toan bang tieng viet, nguoi quan tri chi can biet soan thao! <= Khang dinh dang cap chuyen nghiep;
- Quan tri duoc tat ca text (ky tu) tren website
- Khong gioi han ngon ngu ke ca cac ngon ngu tuong hinh ( nhu: Nhat, Trung Quoc...) 
- Khong gioi han: so trang con, so luong bai viet, hinh anh....;
- Giao dien thiet ke den khi khach hang vua y;
- Toc do, An toan, Bao mat;
-.................va nhieu dieu bat ngo nua dang cho don ban.
- Site demo (Va quan tri thu): http://demo.halong.net.vn 
- Site Huong dan su dung: http://huongdansudung.halong.net.vn

Hay truy cap website cua Ha Long Co.,Ltd  http://www.halong.net.vn de biet them chi tiet ve:
- Cong nghe xay dung, phan mem web HLv3.0, ban duoc loi gi tu HLv3.0
- Bang gia thiet ke website
- Cac trang web ma Ha Long Co.,Ltd da thuc hien va cong tac thiet ke 
- Cac website dang xay dung, chinh sua va hoan thien
- Dich vu dang ky, quan ly domain va hosting 
-  .............. va nhieu thong tin khac .)

Hay lien he voi Ha Long Co.,ltd ngay hom nay de xay dung chien luoc kinh doanh & nam bat thoi co tu internet. 

Tran trong - Ha Long Co.,Ltd
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Website: http://www.halong.net.vn
E-mail: halong@halong.net.vn - Kinhdoanh@halong.net.vn (Lien lac voi Ha Long = 02 Email nay)
Tel/Fax: 04.5658136 
Tru so: Toa nha 4 tang so 17 Ngo 71/46 Hoang Van Thai - Thanh Xuan - Ha Noi
